name: Clairvoyant
tagline: Big Data Solutions for the future.
description:
Clairvoyant is a global technology consulting and services company. We help organizations build innovative products and solutions using big data, analytics, and the cloud. We provide the best-in-class solutions and services that leverage big data and continually exceed client expectations. Our deep vertical knowledge combined with expertise on multiple, enterprise-grade big data platforms helps support purpose-built solutions to meet our client’s business needs.
Clairvoyant is committed to providing strategic and architectural consulting solutions across multiple platforms. A wide variety of data related offerings including Big Data-as-a-Service, Data Lake, Advisory and hosted solutions. Our mission is to provide best in class services that help create high-quality data pipelines and drive measurable analytics outcomes. Deep vertical knowledge helps us create and support purpose-built solutions to meets unique business requirements. Deep industry knowledge coupled with our close partnerships with clients enables us to bring fresh perspectives and creative thinking to the problems we solve. Our entrepreneurial spirit drives us to continually discover better ways to address clients’ needs, ultimately effecting positive change for them and for their industries. We innovate and create new value based solutions with high reliability and integrity leveraging our global delivery and engineering footprint. Clairvoyant’s INSIGHT is a unique platform that helps our client bootstrap their journey into the cloud by providing Cluster & Platform support, Technical support services, Application Support and a unique blend of other value added managed services
Our expertise across several big data platforms gives customers the flexibility to choose the best platform for their requirement from the various options available today Ensuring high levels of security on big-data platforms, we offer our custom built security frameworks as a value added service.
